response.overview: Love is a disaster for Marie and best friend Liz. A desperate Simon (Tim Campbell) is trying to save his Internet business. After chance brings them together they create 'Searching for Mr Right.com', a website to locate husbands for Marie (Petrina Buckley) and Liz (Elisa Kibbis) with help from his friend Ryan (Grant Kurzman). Simon sets the online countdown for Valentine's Day in six months. Marie and Simon discover a little bit about love and each other as they search through the thousands of hopefuls. The Valentine's Day double wedding arrives in a flurry of yelling, confessions and proposals. Now all they have to do is pick the right guy. Set in Geelong, Victoria, this romantic comedy launched Tim Campbell's career.
response.tagline: A woman creates a web site to locate the perfect husband.
response.title: Searching For Mr Right.Com
